name: DRUG SIMULATOR 2077
description:
Oh no! You consumed DRUGS. Which ones? Well.. ALL OF THEM. Yep. You are going to die. (Obviously). Every ten seconds, you get a random side effect.

WHAT AM I GONNA DO?

Well. Uh. I don’t know I’m not a doctor. BUT OH. WHAT IS THIS? A HEALTH POTION? You can collect health potions to delay the inevitable. Try to survive for as long as you can while random effects either help you or mess with you.
